about_the_game:
Sam & Dan: Floaty Flatmates is donationware. Your donation supports our studio and gives us the opportunity to create more games.

As a token of our appreciation, you will be rewarded with an in-game party hat! For the non-vr people, we might be able to provide you with a papercraft partyhat, if you ask us really really nicely.

Since Steam doesn't support a pay what you want system, this DLC is used instead. You can choose one of the five DLC tiers in order to donate a custom amount. You can even choose to purchase multiple DLCs. For more information on donating, please visit this page.

IMPORTANT NOTICE: The game is free and this DLC can not be used to purchase any extra content in the game. However you'll be rewarded with an in-game party hat as a thank you for supporting our studio.

Thanks for joining the party!

~Pelican Party Studios
